112.content:
"Hello Megaman, did you miss me?" There came a voice from nowhere.

"Who was that?" asked Lan. He and Megaman turned around and looked. It was their enemy Laserman, who was thought to be destroyed.

"Laserman? How did you escape before you were destroyed?" asked Megaman.

"Oh you may never know", said Laserman, "Can we get to the point where I annihilate you?"

121111111.title: where are all the tough ones

12111112.content: Being engulfed by flames, let alone flames made by DarkFire, would have caused any normal Navi to jack out in pain. But this was Bass Megaman was facing, and he was a lot tougher then what should be possible. From underneath his burning cape, his hands formed into his twin Bass Busters, and he flung open his burning cape and begin pelting the field with bullets, a move which was well known as Buster Rake. Megaman attempted to dodge all of the attacks, but still found himself being hit, as Bass had acquired the ability to Lock On between his last fight with Megaman and now, and the Buster Rake had gotten even faster then before. Megaman then used another Dark Chip’s power, this one being-
12111112.title: Raw Bass

121112.content:
Across Lan’s PET Screen, glitchy lines begin to stream across the screen as the graphics begin to break down into a glitchy, staticky mess and the audio begin to devolve into white noise. “Megaman? Megaman! The PET’s glitching out! What’s going on!? Megaman! Hub!” The PET’s video screen begins a glitchy mess, before it boots back to the home menu with a large red ERROR where Megaman should be. Lan begin clicking through the menus at a high pace, trying to reach his brother. “Nonono...I gotta get through to him! Megaman! HUUUUUBBBBBB!”

|_____________________^__________|

Megaman’s body floated in a spherical sea of Dark Power that grew and surrounded him, his body taking and soaking it in and being warped in return. His navy under-suit turned to a greyish purple and his smooth blue armor turned rusty red. His yellow shoulder-pads turned blazing red and grew out into prism-esqe shoulder-guards, and his boots became blocky and jaggedly, a rectangular prism that had an larger purple teardrop shaped knee guard and came down past his ankles and formed a heel guard, with the boot toe being greyish purple like his under-suit. His Buster swelled and morphed into a hybrid of a Vulcan and a Mark Cannon, painted in blazing red and with his emblem painted on the guards of the barrel, while his other hand became blocky and jaggedy like his boots, his hand gaining sharp nails and a block on his knuckles and the black of his hand. From his emblem, blocky armor grew, swept upwards and connected with his shoulder-guards, forming chest armor. His helmet became blocky, grew fins like Zero’s helmet, and his ear guard antennas split open as greyish purple gems emerged from them. A purple visor formed over his face, obscuring it and his now brown eyes as they shot open and dispersed the Liquid Dark Power that had surrounded him, landing gracefully yet menacingly on the ground. This was his new Dark Soul, the Burning Soul. He tuned his focus to Bass, and raised his Burning Buster at the powerful Net Navi. His voice crackled with the rage of a thousand scorned. “This time, Bass....you won’t survive.”
121112.title: Burning (My) Soul

1212.content:
‘‘First off, who are you, and what do you want?’’ you ask determinedly. The dark orb of energy seems to shudder as it emits a high pitched, booming laughter. “I am something you don’t understand, don’t comprehend! And what I want is the deletion of the entire internet!” Standard villain fare, but.....”Why?!” you yell back, hoping to get more information out of it. Alas, you don’t. “Why? You don’t need to know, wouldn’t understand! Now enough banter. You deletion equals the end of this wicked internet!” This guy is sounding familiar.....


Lan picked up on it too. “This old man doesn’t give up, does he!” he says angrily. You nod, readying your Buster. “Or die, for that matter! How many death enduring events have he been through and survived?” At this ball gives a sharp, treble-like laugh. “I know who you’re thinking of, and it’s not Wily! But enough talk....DIE!” At these words, the orb grows larger and begins forms into a Navi like shape...but you can’t tell what it’s forming into!

“Lan, we don’t know what we’re up against!” You tell your brotherNet Op. His voice comes back, stubborn and determined, his decision set in stone. “But we can’t run now! Beside, we’ve never run from something like this! Let’s do it, Megaman! Last Operation, Set!” Your battle mask flips shut as you utter ‘Execute!“ and grip your Buster.

Time to see the face of evil.
1212.title: You (Cannot) Reason With It

1221.title: Big Mistake

12211.content:
Soon, both Nebula Grey and Megaman were teleported to Nebula's dimension. There, the fight began. Megaman fired at Nebula but every time he dodged his attacks. Later, Lan found a reactor where it has energy that can make a Navi the most powerful in the world.

Lan had an idea, "Megaman, I got an idea! Go to the reactor over there and absorb it's energy!"

"What?!" said Megaman.

"Just do it!" said Lan.

Then, Megaman raced to the reactor where he created a crack that made the energy from the reactor travel to Megaman.

"NO!" said Nebula Grey, "you can't be getting my energy!"

Well, it's too late for him.
12211.title: Nebula Dimension

Megaman's body begins to glow with a bright light then into pitch darkness. He few taller from 4'9 to 6'9. His appearance has also changed. His hair has turned red-brown, while his helmet turns red with flames on it. His hands turned from blue to red, while his torso and legs turned purple with blue stripes.

Megaman truly became the most powerful navi ever known.

Lan, Chris and Megaman yell in unison, "MIRROR BUSTER!!" Megaman managed to reflect Cosmoman's attack back at him as an energy wave as Cosmoman yells, "DEFEATED?? IMPOSSIBLE!!! NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!" Lan now recieves an Enker Soul navi chip and says, "I owe you one, thanks." Chris then asks, "How about I get to know your friends." Lan quickly says, "OK!" With that, the three and their navis take a tour around the large DenTech City.

choices: “But you won’t like who it is....”
1541212.content:
Lan was confused. “Dark Program?” he said. “Let me guess: The internet is under threat again?“

Chief nodded. “Let me in, and I and our future-flung ally will explain.”
———
A few minutes later, Robert ‘Chief’ Cache was seated in the Hikari family living room, with Lan splayed on the big couch, and Geo sitting on the floor. Megaman’s PET was on the table, propped up.

Lan sat up. “Okay, Dark Program could mean anything, but I need to ask this. Has someone decided to restart the production of Dark Chips again?”

“No, this has nothing to do with Dark Power.” Chief shook his head. “Regal has stuck to a righteous path even since we recovered him from Mt Belenus, and all of Nebula’s tech within the volcano was rendered useless when it erupted. From what we salvaged, none of it was useable. While that doesn’t rule out Nebula remmients, we’re don’t think it has to do with Dark Power or Murkland, Black Earth. This new dark program.....well, I’ll let the future boy explain.“ He gestured to Geo to continue.

“To put it simply, this new Dark Program is reverse engineered from a program in my time. It’s what Clockman was juiced up on, and it’s what we thought Megaman accessed when he fought Clockman.” Geo said, taking over for Chief.

“Just gonna say this now, that was a completely different power that Megaman tapped into. I don’t even know what it was, but I could take a guess.“ Land interrupted. “Go on, I wanna know who made this thing so I can take a shot at them.”

“Right.” Geo said. “The Dark Program works as a Black Navi Cust Program, taking up 6 squares in a K shape. The description says ‘Sets everything to max’, and it does is power up the Navi’s Buster and Abilties, but it also bugs out the Navi. Every Navi that’s had installed has become uncontrollable.”

“The only reason it’s not a threat is that it’s not widespread yet, only being released in test runs.” Chief finished.

“Wait, it’s really called the Dark Program?” Megaman chimed in.

“Yes. Yes it is,” Chief said.

“Alright, so do you know who’s behind this? Because I’m willing to help you kick their butts!” Lan said.

Geo and Chief nodded. “We do.....”
1541212.title: Dark Program

info.brief_description: megaman transforms into a ultimate soul
info.description:
the story is about how megaman gets a new double soul but it need 5 chapters first to determine what that soul is

RULES:
1. needs to have at least 5 chapters before new soul begins
2. the new soul must be someone new so create your own navi or someone megaman hasn't double souled with yet
3. if you want there can be a point where he does a combined double soul where for example megaman double souls with all the navis on team colonel and forms a ultimate mode but this is a example dont use it in the actual story
4.keep cussing to a minimum
and that is it have fun with this
^.^
